alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Crow Wing; North Cass; North Itasca; Northern Aitkin; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; South Aitkin; South Itasca; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 2:57PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Itasca, Aitkin, east central Cass, southern St. Louis, Carlton, northern Crow Wing and west central Lake Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 257 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Tower, to near Floodwood, to Ironton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Floodwood around 300 PM CDT. Biwabik around 310 PM CDT. Embarrass around 315 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Hoyt Lakes, Brookston, Saginaw and Pike Lake Near Duluth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central, northeastern and east central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Crow Wing; North Cass; North Itasca; Northern Aitkin; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; South Aitkin; South Itasca; Southern Lake, North Shore
